definitions.definition: compliance with standards, rules, or laws.
behavior in accordance with socially accepted conventions or standards.
examples: loyalty to one's party need not imply unquestioning conformity

definitions.definition: compliance with the practices of the Church of England.
similarity in form or type; agreement in character.
examples: these changes are intended to ensure conformity between all schemes

definitions.definition: (of strata in contact) a continuous sequence of deposits, typically in parallel strata.
